alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 3:46AM PST until March 01 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Moderate snow. West winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts to 60 mph. Total snow accumulations from a dusting to 2 inches on the valley floor to up to 2 to 4 inches with local amounts to 6 inches. * WHERE...Antelope Valley. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially along Highways 14 and 138. Strong winds could cause tree damage and down power lines.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.
